resources.string: "File name to save in Download directory"
"File will be saved into or read from Download directory."
"Passphrase can be blank but key is not encrypted"
"Touch this box to gather randomness: %1$d%% done"
"In order to ensure randomness during the key generation, move your finger randomly over the box below."

"Failed to recover key-pair from file. Supported formats are encrypted/unencrypted RSA key in PEM format or unencrypted RSA/DSA key in PKCS8 format. Keys generated with 'ssh-keygen -t rsa -m PEM' are known to work."
"Failed to read specified file. Please ensure it is present in your Download directory. The file name specified: "
"Failed to decrypt PEM. It is encrypted, but wrong passphrase was specified. Please specify correct passphrase in the appropriate field, and import again."
"Could not decrypt key. Please enter correct passphrase and try decrypting again."
"Key not generated yet. Set parameters and tap \'Generate New Key\'."
"The public key was copied to the clipboard."
